properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, ADDRESS, AGE, GENDER, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'U'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, ADDRESS, AGE, GENDER, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, ADDRESS, AGE, GENDER ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
